snippet: As they prepared to yield leadership, departing legislators promoted a judge who drew criticism by giving a long prison term to the opposition leader Leopoldo López.
abstract: Departing Venezuelan Congress names Judge Susana Barreiros as head public defender, drawing criticism from opposition leaders; Barreiros was focus of international criticism after sentencing opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez to lengthy prison sentence.
lead_paragraph: As they prepared to yield leadership, departing legislators promoted a judge who drew criticism by giving a long prison term to the opposition leader Leopoldo López.
